alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 9:33PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Alpine, Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Williams. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM Saturday: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Doney Park 1 to 2 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 6 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 3 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
